snippet.title: Bug Trailer 1995
snippet.description:
Bug Trailer 1995

Official Content From Sega Of America

Bug is going Hollywood. Our talented young insect actor is starring in his own movie and you must direct him. Tinsel Town is full of back stabbers who want to destroy bug before he makes it big! Help him bring home the Oscar.
Platforms: Sega Saturn

Sega Saturn
, Action,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Bug
